butt.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the end of a cigarette after most of it has been smoked
butt.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: the thick end of the handle of a gun
butt.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a large round container for collecting or storing liquids
butt.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: the act of hitting someone with your head
butt.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to hit or push against something or someone with your head
butt.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: if an animal butts someone, it hits them with its horns
